title: Bishop Surrenders
description: The Master Dominant and the Virgin Where was their unusual relationship heading?  Six months of snarling, and grumbling cemented Julian Bishop’s status as an all-around jackass  Six months of being unimpressed by the Scarlet Master’s attitude made Braeanna Walsh a legend in her own time  All of it exhausted and mystified the people watching Everyone agreed – something or someone had to give  Welcome to Castle Scarlet Present your membership card and enjoy!
author: Suzanne Halliday
